General.Name: Beijing Telesound Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Telesound Electronics Co., Ltd. provides security solutions in China. The company offers smart security products comprising of X-ray security inspection, security gate, goods detector, goods identification, security inspection information, supervision system, and centralized system related equipment. It also offers monitoring alarm products, such as alarm controller, event recorder, circuit breaker, electrical fire monitoring, alarm and monitoring network, early warning management, and day-to-day management systems. In addition, the company provides intelligent security products, including explosion-proof camera, dual spectrum camera, unmanned aerial vehicle check system, anti-terrorism security management system; video surveillance, video analysis, and video control equipment. Further, it offers information safety products consisting of firewall, scanning system, threat detection, operation and maintenance security system, database audit, application firewall, internet management system, log audit, security situation awareness platform, and mobile security management system. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Beijing, China.
